mapper.insert: insert into user (id, `name`, sex, nation, `date`, address, submitTime, `state`) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, phone, idcard, `name`, state, submit_time as submitTime from tb_user where idcard like concat('%',#{idcard},'%') and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.update: update tb_user set state=#{state} where id =#{id}
